context: Do you like drama? See Phantom Thread (2017) ?
Hi there! I really love Billy Bob Thornton. Can you recommend something besides Sling Blade (1996) that has him in it? I haven't seen Phantom Thread (2017) .
I loved Bad Santa (2003) ! It was wrong in the best way. What about something else? I haven't seen Bad News Bears (2005) , but I know he's in it. Have you seen it?
resp: There was Mr. Woodcock (2007) that was pretty good
